title: Jar And Cover
provenance: Howard Phillips, London, purchased (1-3-64) by WPW
description: Barrel shaped body with lat, cushion cover and round, faceted finial. Loophandle. Flat base, star cut on underside. Alternating vertical panels of small diamonds and herringbone below double band of printies. Cover has printies and spoon notch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-161-a,b.
